record.id: field.name="access.list" and file.name="querystored" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: access.list
record.file.name: querystored

brief.brief: The operator IDs or query groups who can see this particular query.
Only those operators listed by login name or those users who are members of a Query Group (from the operator record) named in the list can access this query.
Leave this field blank to make the query available to all users.

detail.detail: - Build stored queries that are only available to certain users.
- Keep the number of stored queries a user sees at a manageable level.
- Define a Query Group in the operator record of each member of a user class (Tech Level 1, Tech Level 2, etc.) and give them access rights only to the queries they require to do their job.
